dict.acceptation: （引导名词性从句）谁；无论谁，任何人；不管谁…；

sent.orig: Whoever speaks in a tongue builds himself up, but whoever prophesies builds up the church.
sent.trans: 那说语言的，是建立自己；那讲先知话的，却是建立教会。

sent.orig: Whoever watches the wind will not plant; whoever looks at the clouds will not reap.
sent.trans: 《传道书》11:4?看风的必不撒种。望云的必不收割。

sent.orig: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.
sent.trans: 少种的少收，多种的多收。

sent.orig: Whoever kills an animal make restitution, but whoever kills a man must be put to death.
sent.trans: 打死牲畜的，必赔上牲畜，打死人的，必被治死。

sent.orig: Whoever is not with me is against me whoever does not gather with me scatters.
sent.trans: 不随同我的，就是反对我；不同我收集的，就是分散。
